episode_event_5th_anniversary/4001_1001_: Listen well, sync pairs!

My grand festival to celebrate Pasio’s growth
begins now!

I have prepared a lavish venue and a wide array
of events!
Enjoy everything to the fullest! Hahahahaha!
Lear’s in a REALLY good mood today, isn’t he?
He has a lot to be happy about, I guess!

After all, so many people and Pokémon have
come to Pasio, and it’s livelier than ever!
I’ve been looking forward to this too!

*chuckle* You’ve even updated your outfit, haven’t
you?
Yes! I’m ready to go all out and enjoy the festival!

Heh, seeing you so excited about it is getting me
excited, too.
Why don’t we all enjoy the festival together?
That would be lovely, dear...

But don’t you and Gladion have friends you want
to share this experience with?
I’m sure they are anxious to see you.
Yeah... I guess I could go see them first.

You’re right, mother. I would love to enjoy the
festival with the both of you...

but I want to catch up with everyone on Pasio too.
There’s just too many things I want to do!
Let’s hurry, Gladion!
*chuckle* Go ahead and have fun, children.
episode_event_5th_anniversary/6801_1001_:
I’ve made so many memories on Pasio...but I’m
not satisfied yet!

I’m going to make today the most wonderful day
ever!

Are you ready to liven up the festival,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_5th_anniversary/4002_1001_: Excuse me! I’d like one of your sweets, please!
Sure! Coming right up!
Oh, are you on your own, Lillie?
Weren’t you with Gladion and the others?
Well... I was, until just a while ago...

Everyone went off to watch Gladion have a
Pokémon battle with Hau.

But I caught the smell of something sweet and
followed it here!
Quite understandable. I can relate.
Haha, your hunger beat your desire to battle.

You just can’t help giving in when something
smells this delicious!
That’s so true!

By the way, all of you helped make these sweets,
right?
Yeah! I’m confident of the smell and taste!
And here you are! Our special dessert is ready!
Wow! Thank you so much!

Oooh, what have we here? What’s up with this
huge line?
I’m countin’ on you to review this shop, Rosa!
Sure! Leave it to me!
Umm... What’s going on?

Festivals get viewer numbers exploding! It’d be a
waste to NOT share the hype with all of our
friendos outside of Pasio!

C’mon, smile! You’re bein’ broadcast live to the
whole world!
Whaaa?!
Let’s end this! Go!
Hm? What’s goin’ on over there?
Maybe it’s a Pokémon battle?!
A battle? Maybe it’s the one my brother went to?
episode_event_5th_anniversary/4003_1001_:
We’re still ready and eager to battle any and all
challengers!

We want everyone to have fun battling us today,
instead of focusing on winning.
Exactly! After all, it’s a festival!
Let’s all enjoy a long, full day of Pokémon battles!
Oh, it’s Cynthia and the other Champions.
Battling them must take a lot of courage...
What, nobody’s gonna step up?
Then it’s up to us!
It seems we have our next opponent...
I guess we’ll have to go all out.

Indeed! To live our lives to the fullest, we must
battle against the fiercest opposition!
So those are arc suits! They shine so brightly...
Look at their outfits! Are you seeing this, Nemona?!
Yup!

I can tell they’re sooo much stronger now! Their
power’s making my skin tingle!

Aw, man! We could’ve been the ones battling
them if we just got here a little sooner!
We can just take them on next!

Though we need one more sync pair to make a
team...
You should battle with us!

Join us! We’ll all work together and beat the
Champion arc suit team!
Huh?!
Looks like your partner Pokémon is ready to go!
Lunala?!
O-OK! I’ll do what I can...
and battle at full power!
episode_event_5th_anniversary/4004_1001_: Phew... That battle was so nerve-racking...
You’re getting a little too excited, Lunala!
Though I suppose I did have fun, thanks to you!
I’m so tired from all that battling. Let’s rest a little.

I agree. Their music and dancing sure are
impressive.

It’s resonating not just in my eyes and ears, but
also in my heart.

I don’t really understand anything that
complicated...but I do think music is a lot of fun!

It makes me wish that these fun times could
last forever...
episode_event_5th_anniversary/4005_1001_:
Aww, yeah! We combined our music and dance
perfectly, don’tcha think?
Definitely! Dancing to live music felt so amazing!
I’d like to do it again if we have a chance!
Um, excuse me! Has anyone seen Lunala?
I haven’t. Did something happen?

Lunala went off somewhere while I was watching
your performance!
Oh, dear!
How horrible!
A lost Pokémon, eh? Let’s help find it!
All right, let’s go— Wait a second...
Isn’t that Lunala coming towards us?
What?
Lunala!
Hey! Where have you been?
Now, now... It came back safe, so no harm done.

I’m sure it just got overexcited because of the
festival!
M-maybe... Sorry for the hassle, everyone.

Please don’t worry about it. We’re just glad
nothin’ happened.
Anyway...

They say time flies when you’re having fun, but
today seems to be an exception!

We danced so much, I can’t believe it’s still bright
outside!
If we’re on schedule, the time should be around...

What th—?! It’s THAT late?! The sun should’ve set
by now!
Wh-what’s going on?!

Remember when the sky went dark because
Necrozma came to Pasio and absorbed all the
light?

Maybe this was also caused by a powerful
Pokémon...

Like one that can make the darkest of nights light
up like midday...
Lunala, did you...?
episode_event_5th_anniversary/4006_1001_:
When you called me for help, Lillie, I certainly
wasn’t expecting this.

They say the intense light Solgaleo radiates from
its body can make the darkest of nights as bright
as midday...

That power must be the reason why night
won’t fall.

It says it feels uneasy because someone suddenly
brought it here.
It’s confused, and that’s why it’s emitting light.
I think Lunala brought it here for me...

because I said I wanted the festival to last
forever.
It just wanted to make you happy, Lillie.

I understand that Lunala is known to occasionally
summon unknown life-forms from other worlds.

Lunala is saying it was the one who brought
Solgaleo here.

It makes me happy that you wanted to make my
wish come true.

But if today doesn’t end, a new tomorrow can
never begin!
We should start by calming you down, Solgaleo.

And after that...let’s enjoy what little we have
left of today!
episode_event_5th_anniversary/4007_1001_: Sorry for all the trouble, everyone!

It caused a little commotion, but it seems the
situation has been dealt with.

As such, I will overlook the trouble caused by this
incident.

Though I am surprised you managed to partner
with Solgaleo.
N said that Solgaleo seems to like Pasio...

and since it became friends with Lunala, it decided
to stay!

But it’s already so late, and the festival will be
over soon...
Yup yup! I’m ready any time!
Let’s light up the night sky with a colorful illusion!
It’s very sad that today is coming to an end...

but if the night hadn’t come, I wouldn’t be able to
see such beautiful fireworks.

The sun and moon will keep rising and setting...
When one day ends, a new day begins...

So let’s all work together to keep making each
tomorrow the best day ever!
